Class ShapeType.Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ShapeType.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FoodType.Food, UnitType.Unit
    Enclosing class:
    ShapeType

    public abstract class ShapeType.Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Figura geométrica particular con las características comunes de este tipo.
